steps.title: Stock up on neutral colors.
steps.content: Stock up on neutral colors. People tend to associate bright colors with kids and more subdued colors with adults. If you’re not ready to completely give up bright colors, try pairing them with browns, blacks, greys or whites. [1] X Expert Source Alice Wu Image Consultant Expert Interview. 12 June 2020. No need to toss out the bright colored tees from your youth just yet. Throw on a neutral blazer over a t-shirt to instantly elevate your look without suppressing your personal style. [2] X Research source Check if you have closet essentials like a high-quality t-shirt of a solid color that you can dress up or down. [3] X Expert Source Cassandra Sethi Personal Stylist & Image Consultant Expert Interview. 9 September 2021. A super-soft black, grey, white, or navy sweater. [4] X Expert Source Cassandra Sethi Personal Stylist & Image Consultant Expert Interview. 9 September 2021. Comfortable yet good-looking trousers that you can wear even when you step out of your house. [5] X Expert Source Cassandra Sethi Personal Stylist & Image Consultant Expert Interview. 9 September 2021.

steps.title: Avoid overly distracting clothing.
steps.content: Avoid overly distracting clothing. Anything complicated or revealing is likely to cause people to read you as younger than you want them to. Opt for a slightly more conservative appearance, and let your personality and abilities be what stand out in people’s minds. [6] X Research source Often this is as easy as buttoning up four buttons on a shirt instead of three. Other times it'll require buying slightly more modest items.

steps.title: Grab a versatile shift dress.
steps.content: Grab a versatile shift dress. A shift dress is a flat, usually sleeveless dress that hangs down from the shoulders without being too form fitting. They’re great for both casual and business-casual settings, making them a staple in many women's wardrobes. [7] X Research source Stick with neutral colored dresses to really drive home the mature look. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Buy a suit or pantsuit in a neutral color.
steps.content: Buy a suit or pantsuit in a neutral color. Suits go a long way in projecting a mature air in business settings. A thicker material like wool will exude quality and professionalism. [9] X Research source If you live in a warm climate, try a tropical wool pantsuit for quality and comfort. [10] X Research source Just make sure to avoid anything too big and boxy. Oversized clothes can make you look younger than you are. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Stock up on button-down shirts or blouses.
steps.content: Stock up on button-down shirts or blouses. Button-down blouses are a mainstay of adult men's and women's fashion. Keep a couple in your closet for an easy way to give off a more mature image. [12] X Research source For women, try out a silk blouse. It's a great way to bring a little bit of charm into a mature and professional outfit. [13] X Research source If you're looking for something to wear with a suit, consider a ruffled blouse for a little extra flair. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Toss out ill-fitting clothes.
steps.content: Toss out ill-fitting clothes. Get rid of anything that’s too loose or too tight. While some tight or baggy clothes might look stylish on a young person, on an adult they just look immature. Instead, opt for clothes that fit well to achieve a more adult look. [15] X Research source

steps.title: Find yourself a good tailor.
steps.content: Find yourself a good tailor. Nothing beats a tailored suit, jacket or pair of pants. Even if you’re not prepared to lay out for a fully custom-made wardrobe, consider having a few off the rack outfits tailored to fit you better. Even a minor alteration can make a huge difference in making you look more mature. [16] X Research source

steps.title: Tuck in your shirt or blouse.
steps.content: Tuck in your shirt or blouse. [17] X Expert Source Alice Wu Image Consultant Expert Interview. 12 June 2020. You’ll look much more put together than you did with your shirt half-tucked or untucked and hanging out. you can do a full tuck or just tuck in the front of the shirt, leaving the back loose. [18] X Research source Some tops, particularly women's tunics and sweaters, are meant to be worn untucked. Leaving these garments untucked doesn't necessarily make you look young. If your shirt has tails, or gets longer in the back and shorter in the front, it's probably meant to be tucked in. [19] X Research source After tucking in your shirt, raise you arms straight up over your head to make sure you haven't tucked too far. [20] X Research source

steps.title: Iron, fold, and hang your clothes.
steps.content: Iron, fold, and hang your clothes. Wrinkled clothes scream immaturity! Iron your clothes before you wear them, and fold or hang them properly after you take them off, and you’ll be totally wrinkle free! [21] X Research source Using a clothes steamer is another option for keeping your shirts smooth and unwrinkled. Steaming will eliminate any lurking odors in the shirt as well. [22] X Research source

steps.title: Buy some more formal shoes.
steps.content: Buy some more formal shoes. [23] X Expert Source Alice Wu Image Consultant Expert Interview. 12 June 2020. Swap the sneakers and sandals for a pair of leather boots, dress shoes, heels, or nice flats. You'll look much more adult than you did in your old tennis shoes. [24] X Research source A pair of stiletto heels can propel nearly any look into adulthood. Wear them around the office for a more mature image. [25] X Research source Go for skinny heels over thicker ones. Shoes with skinnier heels tend to be worn by adults, whereas thicker heels are more common to young people. [26] X Research source Don't underestimate the power of flats. In both casual and business settings, a nice pair of flats or loafers can go a long way in making you look more adult. [27] X Research source

steps.title: Shop for a nice statement bag.
steps.content: Shop for a nice statement bag. A statement bag can really help pull a style together, and often serves as the centerpiece for an outfit. A good leather bag that's functional and stylish without being too flashy will really help mature your look. [28] X Research source Make sure you look for a bag that's big enough to be functional, but not so big that it calls unwarranted attention to it. [29] X Research source

steps.title: Invest in a leather briefcase.
steps.content: Invest in a leather briefcase. Men who want to look more mature will benefit from retiring their backpack or messenger bag and making an investment in a high-quality leather briefcase. A good briefcase will last a lifetime, and it'll show the world that you mean business.

steps.title: Consider wearing glasses.
steps.content: Consider wearing glasses. A chic pair of glasses will instantly make you seem older and wiser in any setting. [30] X Research source For a little extra pizzazz, shop for a pair of designer frames. If you have a round face, look for frames with angled corners like a retro wingtip or a cat eye shape. If you have a more square face, go for round or curved frames. People with elongated faces should lean towards frames that are a little wider than their brow line.

steps.title: Wear matching accessories.
steps.content: Wear matching accessories. Aim to have your shoes, handbag, and any other accessories match in color or material. Wearing black leather shoes? Look for a matching black leather handbag and a black hairband. Dressing with a coherent theme will help to make you appear more mature.

steps.title: Don't go overboard on accessories.
steps.content: Don't go overboard on accessories. Although accessories can elevate an outfit, if you wear too many you'll run the risk of coming off as immature. [31] X Research source Choose one or two accessory pieces, like a necklace and pair of earrings, rather than four or five. [32] X Research source Understated is usually better than overstated when it comes to accessories that make you look more mature. [33] X Research source
